name: market for concrete, 40MPa | concrete, 40MPa | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19773/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;The dataset represents 1m3 of ready-mix 40 MPa concrete in Colombia; this dataset covers the period from 2014 to 2016.;Average transportation distance was taken from literature.

From concrete plant gate, with concrete mixer truck already loaded.

This activity ends at the construction site where the ready-mix concrete is delivered. The dataset includes the ready-mix concrete and its transportation to the construction site. Losses due to concrete returned from the construction site have been accounted in the concrete production dataset.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The production volume and current working plants of 2016 is considered.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset represents the current distances for ready mix concrete production in Colombia
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: This dataset represents the current technology for ready mix concrete production in Colombia
